participant_1.background:
I go to Comic Con and play with animals in my free time.
i enjoy singing.
i like simple jokes.
i am a huge fan of dogs.
i cannot get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth.

participant_2.background:
I need to feel like I can be myself around my partner.
i am going to school for writing.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
i want to be a journalist but instead i sell washers at sears.
I want to quit skiing, but I'm afraid of disappointing my parents.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hello, I'm doing okay. How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to read, write, and play with my dog.
That's great! I like to sing, go to Comic Con, and play with animals.
I love dogs! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Charlie. He's the best!
Golden retrievers are so friendly! What do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of things, but I'm really into fantasy and science fiction.
I love science fiction! I'm currently reading a book by Isaac Asimov.
That's a great book! I've read a few of his books.
He's one of my favorite authors.
I'm glad to hear you're a fan!
I'm a fan of all good books. What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing all kinds of music, but I'm mostly into pop and rock.
I love pop and rock music too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favorites are Imagine Dragons, Panic! at the Disco, and Twenty One Pilots.
I love all of those bands! We have similar taste in music.
I'm glad to hear that! We should exchange music recommendations sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to hear what you're listening to.
Sounds good! I'll send you a link to my Spotify playlist.
Great! I'll do the same.
